The Time Travellerâ€™s Almanac Part 3: Mazes and Traps - Ann and Jeff VanderMeer





The Time Travellerâ€™s Almanac is the largest, most definitive collection of time travel stories ever assembled. Intrepid chrononauts and world-renowned anthologists Ann and Jeff VanderMeer have scoured time itself to bring you these classic stories. Be warned: reality will be warped, wormholes opened, paradoxes woven and parallel universes breached.

This is the third volume of four:
Mazes and Traps â€“ Stories in which the paradox of time travel is front-and-centre, and characters become trapped in those paradoxes.
